nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: [The old man squints at you from behind a pair of greasy goggles. The air hums with the sound of the massive refinery.] Another captain come to gawk at the Crucible. You all think it's just a factory. You have no idea what we really do here.

choices.text: "Enlighten me. What do you do here?"
[Engineering] "I'm reading a massive energy flux from the core. How do you keep the containment from breaching?"
[Void Touched] "The material you process... it's in pain."

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: We're undertakers. We process the corpses of gods and sell them for fuel. Now, unless you have real business, I'm busy.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: [He looks at you with newfound respect.] You're not like the others. You can feel it. Hear it. The truth of this place. Come with me. There's something you need to see.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: Everyone thinks the gates are just machines. They're not. They're alive. Or they were. Now... they're dying. The 'void gate materials' we refine? It's their blood. Their flesh. And the 'Song of Unmaking' you hear? That's their scream.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: Of us. Every time we force a gate open, every time a ship passes through, it weakens them. We're killing them with a thousand tiny cuts. And now, something else is coming through the wounds we've made. The Phantoms.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: Is that what they teach you in the academy? Then you're a fool, like all the rest. Get out of my refinery.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: I've spent fifty years listening to them die. And I've built two things. I can only give you one. Your choice.

choices.text: Take the device he holds in his left hand: a crystalline resonator.
Take the datapad he holds in his right hand: his research notes.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: The 'Heartbeat'. It can soothe a gate's pain, stabilize it for a short time. Make passage safer. But the Phantoms... they hate the sound it makes. They will notice you.

nodes.speaker: old_engineer_kail
nodes.text: My research. It details how to... weaponize the decay. How to force a gate to collapse in a directed energy blast of unimaginable power. A weapon to end all wars. Or all life.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have offended the old engineer, and have been unceremoniously thrown out of the refinery.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have received the 'Heartbeat', a device that can soothe the dying gates, but may attract unwanted attention.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have received Kail's research notes, a blueprint for a weapon of terrifying power.
